messages.message:
*Feature requests for Analyze (Converse chats + chatbots):*
1. Be able to edit last query & regenerate agent response
    a. Rationale: I often find myself wanting to re-run a query with some adjustments to phrasing, etc, but instead, I need to repeat the query (with any additional file references/uploaded files [testing uploading documents in chatBOT query feature])... or worse, sometimes I need to clear the chat because I don't want new context to influence results. On top of this, sometimes the agents' response isn't consistent, and changes between attempts, taking time and adding friction to my analysis workflow.
2. Interrupt/(or more importantly, terminate) agent response
    a. Rationale: During chat & chatbot use, sometimes I find that I've asked the wrong query and/or used the wrong files and/or context and need to try again. However, I can't currently stop the agent response and need to wait until the (sometimes lengthy) response is completed, by which point, my natural conversation flow (and flow of thoughts/ideas/things to analyze) becomes interrupted
